script.en: A hallway. First day of school.

script.text: 小李在看手机，走路。王崩也在看手机，走路。两个人撞到了。小李的包掉了，东西散了一地。
script.en: 小李 walks while staring at her phone. 王崩 walks while staring at his phone. They collide. 小李's bag drops, stuff scatters everywhere.

script.zh: 对。不过我不用学中文。我是台湾人，中文是我的母语。我来上课是因为——
script.en: Yeah. But I don't need to learn Chinese. I'm Taiwanese, Chinese is my native language. I'm in class because—

script.zh: 等一下。你是台湾人？那你的中文已经很好了吧？为什么还上中文课？
script.en: Wait. You're Taiwanese? Then your Chinese is already good right? Why take Chinese class?

script.zh: 我看不懂简体字。我从小用繁体字。但是——你知道嘛——全世界都在用简体字，做生意也用简体字，没办法，必须学。虽然繁体字才是正统！
script.en: I can't read simplified characters. I grew up with traditional. But—you know—the whole world uses simplified, business uses simplified, no choice, gotta learn. Even though traditional is the REAL one!

script.zh: 你知道吗？珍珠奶茶是台湾发明的。
script.en: Did you know? Bubble tea was invented in Taiwan.
...why are you saying this right now?

script.zh: 没有，就想说。很多人不知道。
script.en: No reason, just wanted to say it. Lots of people don't know.

script.zh: 嘿嘿嘿！你们好！你们没事吧？！我看到你掉东西了！我帮你！
script.en: Hey hey hey! Hi! You guys okay?! I saw you drop stuff! Let me help!

script.text: 矮中蹲下来捡东西。拿起电子烟，看了半天。
script.en: 矮中 crouches to pick things up. Grabs the vape, stares at it.

script.zh: 哦不好意思不好意思！我叫矮中！我超爱中国文化！你们也是中文课的吗？这也太cool了吧？！No cap我等了一个暑假了！
script.en: Oh sorry sorry! I'm Ai Zhong! I LOVE Chinese culture! You're in Chinese class too? That's SO cool?! No cap I waited all summer!
Bro, look at her, isn't she fine?

script.zh: 没有没有！我说你很……呃……很high class。
script.en: Nothing nothing! I said you're very... uh... very high class.
小李 puts on headphones and walks away.

script.text: 教室。小黑已经坐好了，在拍奶茶的照片。清清坐在最前面。
script.en: Classroom. 小黑 is already seated, photographing her boba. 清清 sits in the front row.

script.zh: 那个台湾的！天哪，他好帅。像韩国明星。他有aura你知道吗？就是那种——气场！
script.en: The Taiwanese one! OMG he's so hot. Like a K-pop star. He has aura you know? That—presence!
'Okay'?! Is there something wrong with your eyes?

script.text: 怪老师进来了。白人。四十多岁。笑容满面。
script.en: 怪老师 enters. White. Forties. Beaming smile.

script.zh: 同学们好！欢迎来到中级中文课！我是你们的老师，你们叫我怪老师就好了。
script.en: Hello students! Welcome to intermediate Chinese! I'm your teacher, just call me Guai Laoshi.

script.zh: 等一下。我们的中文老师是白人？
script.en: Wait. Our Chinese teacher is white?

script.zh: 老师！你的中文也太牛了吧！你学了多久？
script.en: Teacher! Your Chinese is SO good! How long have you studied?

script.zh: 十五年。我二十五岁的时候来的中国。就再也没走。
script.en: Fifteen years. Came to China when I was 25. Never left.

script.zh: 因为我爱这个地方。文化，语言，人……
script.en: Because I love this place. The culture, the language, the people...

script.text: 他看了一眼刚走进来的小李。
script.en: He glances at 小李, who just walked in.

script.zh: 好！我们来自我介绍。说一下你叫什么，你从哪里来的，为什么学中文。矮中，你先来吧！
script.en: Okay! Let's do self-introductions. Say your name, where you're from, why you're studying Chinese. Ai Zhong, you first!

script.zh: 好！我叫矮中！我是美国人！我超爱中国文化！中国菜，中国电影，中国——
script.en: Okay! I'm Ai Zhong! I'm American! I LOVE Chinese culture! Chinese food, Chinese movies, Chinese—

script.zh: 你已经说了三次「中国」了。

script.en: Because I really love it! No cap!

script.zh: 王崩。台北人。我来这个大学是学艺术设计的。中文没问题，就是要学简体字。因为……全球经济用简体。但是我觉得繁体字好看多了。你知道吗，台湾的设计风格在全亚洲都是最好的——
script.en: Wang Beng. From Taipei. I'm at this university studying art and design. Chinese is fine, just need to learn simplified. Because... the global economy uses simplified. But I think traditional characters look way better. You know, Taiwan's design aesthetic is the best in all of Asia—

script.zh: 我叫小黑。我爸妈是广东人。他们在家只说广东话，所以我的普通话很烂。我听得懂大部分，但是一开口就像外国人。
script.en: I'm Xiao Hei. My parents are Cantonese. They only speak Cantonese at home, so my Mandarin is trash. I understand most of it, but when I talk I sound like a foreigner.

script.zh: 那不叫「像外国人」。那叫双语干扰。
script.en: That's not 'sounding like a foreigner.' That's bilingual interference.

script.zh: 我叫清清。我是新加坡人。我在新加坡、迪拜和伦敦都住过。我的中文太formal了。我来这里是想说话更natural一点。
script.en: I'm Qingqing. I'm Singaporean. I've lived in Singapore, Dubai, and London. My Chinese is too formal. I'm here to sound more natural.

script.zh: 等一下，你为什么有英国口音？
script.en: Wait, why do you have a British accent?

script.zh: ……是的。中文带英国口音。我知道很奇怪。
script.en: ...yes. Chinese with a British accent. I know it's weird.
小李 doesn't look up. Eyes on phone.

script.zh: 哦。我叫小李。中美混血。妈妈是中国人。但是我们……不太说话。所以我中文不好。
script.en: Oh. I'm Xiao Li. Half Chinese half American. Mom is Chinese. But we... don't really talk. So my Chinese is bad.

script.zh: 为什么你和妈妈不说话？
script.en: Why don't you talk to your mom?

script.text: 他看了小李比较久。清清注意到了。
script.en: He looks at 小李 a beat too long. 清清 notices.

script.zh: 小李，以后我们可以一起练中文吗？我知道一家很好吃的——
script.en: Xiao Li, can we practice Chinese together sometime? I know a really good—
You were going to say restaurant.
Because that's all you ever say.

vocab.note: 年轻人不说你好。说嘿、嗨、哎
北京口音加儿化。万能回答
王崩认为繁体字才是正统
台湾发明的！（王崩提醒你）

vocab.en: to look at each other in dismay
vocab.note: 学生看到白人老师的反应

grammarNotes.title: 叫 vs 姓 vs 是
grammarNotes.body: 课本中文: 你好，请问您贵姓？ 真实中文: 嘿，你叫什么？

examples.real: 你姓什么？/ 你叫什么？

grammarNotes.title: 是……的 — for background info
grammarNotes.body: Used to emphasize circumstances of a past action.

examples.zh: 清清是在伦敦上过学的。
examples.en: Qingqing went to school in London.

grammarNotes.title: 呢 — redirect question
grammarNotes.body: 呢 bounces the question back. 我叫矮中！你呢？ = And you?

grammarNotes.title: 了 as emphasis / change of state
grammarNotes.body: 太牛了吧 = SO awesome! 又来了 = Here we go again.

cultureNotes.title: 打招呼 — Real Greetings
cultureNotes.body: 课本教你说你好。没有人这样打招呼。年轻人说：嘿、嗨、哎、或者直接说对方的名字。你好只在面试、打电话给不认识的人用。你对朋友说你好他们会觉得你在开玩笑。

cultureNotes.title: 白人教中文？
cultureNotes.body: 偶尔会有母语不是中文的人教中文课。学生的反应通常是：这合法吗？问题不是他们的中文水平，而是——他们为什么来中国住了十五年？

cultureNotes.title: 简体字 vs 繁体字
cultureNotes.body: 台湾用繁体字。中国大陆用简体字。香港和澳门也用繁体字。王崩觉得繁体字是正统的。这是一个非常heated的话题。别在饭桌上讨论。
